long_description: The DivaCup(TM) Model 2 is a modern, leading-edge menstrual cup and offers an alternative to tampons and pads-clean, easy-to-use and completely reliable. 2 models have been developed to meet the needs of every woman: Model 2 is for women over 30 years old and/or for women who have delivered vaginally or by C-section. Soft, durable cup is made from silicone that is latex free and chlorine free. Accommodates changing flow; simply empty 2 to 3 times daily and reinsert. Offers 12 hour protection and can be worn confidently overnight. Feminine hygiene disposal is a problem worldwide: Over 12 billion sanitary pads and 7 billion tampons are dumped into landfills in the U.S. alone each year. DivaCup is reusable, economical and helps counter the negative eco-effect left by disposable feminine hygiene. Do not use if you have an intrauterine device (IUD).
short_description: The DivaCup(TM) Model 2 is a modern, leading-edge menstrual cup and offers an alternative to tampons and pads-clean, easy-to-use and completely reliable.
